file_content.text: With the Republic trounced, my bomber wing's free to slam Taris. Imperial Bomber Command thanks you.
Nice work taking out Orda. Glad my bombers could assist.
Orda's walkers are toast. Another success for Imperial Bomber Command.
Darth Gravus wants a word.
My lord--I'm transmitting the coordinates to my bombers now. They're ready to strike Orda's walkers at your command.
Excellent. Hit them now, Major.
Pardon me, Lord Gravus. It's your apprentice.... She's taken Imperial forces, launched her own attack against Commander Orda.
Ha! Thank you, Captain. We'll deal with her.
Thana's volatility is both a strength and a weakness. She'll destroy much, but she can't defeat Orda alone.
I'll deal with Orda and his pathetic forces.
Leave his death to me.
Orda's ruin demands my mastery of the dark side.
Only I can break him.
He's defeated countless Sith. Be clever and wary.
Orda's demise will be a warning to the Republic.
Leave his death to me.
He's familiar with Imperial tactics. Make every shot count.
I'll bury Orda beneath the ruins of Taris.
Leave his death to me.
Many bounty hunters have fallen to his blaster. Don't pull any punches.
I hope he gives her some bruises for me.
Thana deserves a good beating.
Every punishment she suffers will only increase her fury... and her strength.
There goes my surprise attack.
Look on the bright side. The more Republic forces alerted to your strike, the more you can kill.
You'll find Orda's base in an old purification facility. Tear down his defenses, and find my rogue apprentice. Only together can you slaughter the Republic's leader.
Orda's offensive will soon come to an end.
It will be done.
This will be a historic victory for the Empire.
I can kill Orda without her interference.
I don't need Thana's help.
You are truly so powerful? Prove it.
Don't get your hopes up.
I expect the best. I'm sure you'll deliver.
End Orda's life. And I'll add a special prize, if you kill more soldiers than my wayward apprentice.
I have the walkers' coordinates. Darth Gravus wants them blown to pieces.
Gladly. Imperial Bomber Command never disappoints.
Major Nost, Imperial Bomber Command. Darth Gravus told me to stand by while you retrieve the coordinates.
The Republic's out there, using debris to hide from my bombers.
